text: @JoeBiden Too much what? Deaths are significantly going down, under 35 are 44% of whose death rate is .1% , spike of COVID19. Increase brought on by your supporters who were protesting, assaulting and destroying. All those w COVID19 have meds to treat & China’s attempt to kill us foiled.
